text: Balo -- ''nihsandeha amara prabhu nisid'dha karechena aslilata -- tara ya prakasa paya o ya gopana thake, ara papacara, ara n'yayabirud'dha bidrohacarana, ara allah‌ra sange tomara ya sarika karo yara jan'ya kono dalila tini abatirna karena ni, ara yena tomara allah‌ra birud'dhe balo ya tomara jano na.’’
